Can I use the software for commercial purposes without having to include the copyright notice and permission notice in all copies or substantial portions of the software?

No, the permission notice clearly states that the enclosed copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the software. This means that if you want to use the software, including for commercial purposes, you must include these notices in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
